moreBlocks.otherOffices: Moore Law Firm (Main Office) 4578 Camp Lowell Drive Tucson, AZ 85712 520-729-3760

description:
When you work with the Moore Law Firm, you can expect nothing less than superior advocacy. We will work diligently to resolve your family's legal matters, help you achieve the future you envision and increase your odds of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation to which you are entitled depending on your unique situation.

With two locations in Tucson, Arizona, our law firm strives to provide you with compassionate and competent representation. We have helped many clients here in Tucson and the surrounding areas with the legal issues their families face, including:

  • Medical malpractice matters, including misdiagnosis, medication and anesthesia mistakes, surgical and birth injuries, and more
  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims, including motor vehicle accidents, product liability claims and premises liability claims
  • Probate and estate administration
  • Estate planning, including wills and trusts and powers of attorney
  • Immigration issues affecting your family, such as citizenship, green cards, employment and student visas, and more

We understand that your family is the most important thing to you, and matters affecting them can have a significant impact on your future. When you choose to work with our attorneys, we will use all our knowledge, experience and resources to help you resolve these matters and to reduce the stress and frustration you may feel during this challenging time.

Our law office offers a free initial consultation during which we can answer all of your questions and concerns while determining the best path forward for you. We also currently offer virtual consultations because your and your family's safety remains paramount to us here at the Moore Law Firm.
